Wouldn’t this world be a better place? Yeah, we think so too. We’ll soon know the sheer joy of all-day happy hour when the new Pie In The Sky Pizza location (in the old Longhorn Steakhouse building) opens next week. They’ll have 2-for-1 Yazoo drafts… All day, every day. Count us in! Now if only the Cool Springs location would swing us the same special… Our lunch breaks would get a little brighter.
